content: keyhole cluster scarf keep warm and be fashionable too materials red heart plush yarn 80% acrylic 20% nylon color 9220 apricot approx 139 yards 3 oz crochet hook size n or size required to meet gauge yarn needle gauge 4 clusters = 2 5 inches 3 cluster row = 2 5 inches model shown is 36 inches long special stitches cluster * yo draw through st yo and draw through 2 loops leaving last 2 loops on hook repeat from * 2 more times then yo and draw through all 4 loops on hook 1 cluster made beg cluster * yo draw through st yo and draw through 2 loops leaving last 2 loops on hook repeat from * 1 time then yo and draw through all 3 loops on hook beg cluster made decrease cluster * yo draw through st yo and draw through 2 loops leaving last 2 loops on hook in next st repeat from * 2 more times then yo and draw through all loops on hook decrease cluster made instructions chain 7 row 1 work beg cluster in fourth chain from hook cluster in each chain across chain 3 turn 4 clusters row 2 work beg cluster in top of first cluster 2 clusters in each of next 2 clusters cluster in last cluster chain 3 turn 6 clusters row 3 work beg cluster in top of first cluster cluster in same space cluster in each of next 4 clusters 2 clusters in last cluster chain 3 turn 8 clusters row 4 work beg cluster in top of first cluster cluster in top of each cluster across chain 3 turn repeat row 4 until a total of 36 row have been made form keyhole work beg cluster in top of first cluster cluster in the next 2 clusters chain 3 skip next 2 clusters cluster in each of next 3 clusters chain 3 turn row 38 work beg cluster in top of first cluster cluster in the next 2 clusters work cluster in chain-3 space cluster in each of next 3 clusters chain 3 turn 7 clusters row 39 work decrease cluster over first 2 clusters cluster in each of next 3 clusters work decrease cluster over next 2 clusters chain 3 turn 5 clusters row 40 work beg cluster in top of first cluster cluster in each cluster across chain 3 turn 5 clusters row 41 work first double_crochet of cluster in top of first cluster work 2 dcs of cluster in next cluster yo draw through all loops on hook to complete decrease cluster cluster in next cluster work decrease cluster over next 2 clusters chain 3 turn 3 clusters edging work beg cluster in top of first cluster cluster in next cluster 2 clusters in next cluster working along edge of scarf work clusters evenly until you reach the first row worked work 2 clusters in end of row 1 cluster in each cluster across work 2 clusters in other end of
